metadata.title: CVE-2023-44469 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Server-Side Request Forgery issue in the OpenID Connect Issuer inLemonLDAP::NG before 2.17.1 allows authenticated remote attackers to sendGET requests to arbitrary URLs through the request_uri authorizationparameter. This is similar to CVE-2020-10770.

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
